price: Ergasii dhaabbachuu hin dandeenye; tumsamoos hin taane.
arabic: فَمَا ٱسۡتَطَٰعُواْ مِن قِيَامٖ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنتَصِرِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: famā is'taṭāʿū min qiyāmin wamā kānū muntaṣirīna
